title: Doppler - truck horn and observers 1 and 2 motion

content.question:
A truck emits a sound of constant rest frequency <math alttext="f sub T" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>f</mi><mi>T</mi></msub></math> from its horn as it travels at a constant velocity along a road. Two observers in separate cars hear the horn. Observer <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> hears the horn first as a frequency higher than <math alttext="f sub T" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>f</mi><mi>T</mi></msub></math> and then at a frequency lower than <math alttext="f sub T" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>f</mi><mi>T</mi></msub></math>. Observer <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> hears a constant frequency emitted by the truck’s horn. Which of the following could describe the motion of both observers?
Observer <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math>’s MotionObserver <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>’s MotionAObserver <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> approaches the truck and then passes it, maintaining a constant speed.Observer <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> remains stationary as the truck approaches and then passes by Observer <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>.BObserver <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> approaches the truck and then passes it, maintaining a constant speed.Observer <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> follows behind the truck, maintaining a constant distance between their car and the truck.CObserver <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> follows behind the truck, maintaining a constant distance between their car and the truck.Observer <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> remains stationary as the truck approaches and then passes by Observer <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>.DObserver <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> follows behind the truck, maintaining a constant distance between their car and the truck.Observer <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> follows behind both the truck and Observer <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math>, maintaining a constant distance to both Observer <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> and the truck.
